text: to add support for 7z compressed tarballs, we only need to add the `.7z` extension in <https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/blob/76402b8974aba76f4412e59bee2e4bc6be1b7860/src/PlatformEngines.jl#L463>?  anything else?  (CC: <@U679T6QF7>)

text: Should probably add `zstd` while we're at it

Aside:
using the URL is not a great way to determine the filetype.
Or even the filename.

Now that we have libcurl at our finger tips we should be doing it the same way  I setup HTTP.jl to do it.
<https://github.com/JuliaWeb/HTTP.jl/blob/337a372aace7ea80273f5d859b1bbf9d306c13e7/src/download.jl#L57-L61>
